questions.question_text: Which of the following statements about central NAT are true? (Choose two.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: AB
can be enabled or disabled both in the GUI and the CLI
IN FortiOS 7.2 it can be enabled or disabled both in the GUI and the CLI

choices.B: Central NAT can be enabled or disabled from the CLI only.
choices.D: Destination NAT, using central NAT, requires a VIP object as the destination address in a firewall policy.
choices.C: Source NAT, using central NAT, requires at least one central SNAT policy.
choices.A: IP tool references must be removed from existing firewall policies before enabling central NAT.

questions.question_text: Which statement concerning IPS is false?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
B is false as a sniffer cannot block traffic

choices.A: IPS packages contain an engine and signatures used by both IPS and other flow-based scans.
choices.D: The status of the last service update attempt from FortiGuard IPS is shown on System>Config>FortiGuard and in output from 'diag autoupdate version'
choices.B: One-arm topology with sniffer mode improves performance of IPS blocking.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: ABC
Correct answer can be found here: https://docs.fortinet.com/document/fortigate/7.4.1/administration-guide/153498/data-leak-prevention#:~:text=DLP%20can%20archive%20some%20or,and%20total%20size%20are%20recorded.

choices.E: Email body (for the case of SMTP traffic)
choices.C: Recipient email address (for the case of SMTP traffic)
choices.A: Visited URL (for the case of HTTP traffic)
choices.D: Attached file (for the case of SMTP traffic)
choices.B: Sender email address (for the case of SMTP traffic)

questions.question_text: Of the following information, what can be recorded by a Data Leak Prevention sensor configured to do a summary archiving? (Choose three.)
Which portion of the configuration does an administrator specify the type of IPsec configuration (either policy-based or route-based)?

choices.A: Under the IPsec VPN global settings.

questions.question_text: Which of the following statements is true regarding the TCP SYN packets that go from a client, through an implicit web proxy (transparent proxy), to a web server listening at TCP port 80? (Choose three.)

choices.C: The destination IP address matches the proxy IP address.
choices.A: The source IP address matches the client IP address.
choices.D: The destination IP address matches the server IP addresses.
choices.E: The destination TCP port number is 80.
choices.B: The source IP address matches the proxy IP address.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: BDE
https://community.fortinet.com/t5/FortiGate/Technical-Tip-FortiGate-transparent-proxy-with-web-cookie/ta-p/205238

Transparent proxy intercepts the connection so the connection then shows a source IP of the proxy
